text.description:
{Ring of Elements}

Doubles the amount of elementals summoned through Summon Air Elemental, Summon Earth Elemental, Summon Fire Elemental and Summon Water Elemental spells.
text.event: Your travel is interrupted by a swarm of elementals fighting eachother, bringing destruction to this place. In the middle, you find a horrified sorceress who calls for your help. After resolving the problem, she hands you the Ring of Elements - the source of everything.
text.name: Ring of Elements
